articles.title: Top diabetic drug goes off patent, prices to fall by 3rd - Times of India
articles.description: India Business News:  In good news for diabetics, cheaper versions of a blockbuster drug — Januvia (Sitagliptin) — hit the market on Wednesday, with more expected soon.

articles.title: Zomato Replies To Online vs Offline Food Prices Controversy - NDTV
articles.description: A Zomato customer recently shared a discrepancy between the rates at the restaurant and on the app. His post went viral, sparking a debate on whether on not the surge is justified.
articles.content: New Delhi: Ordering food online has become hassle-free with the advent of several food delivery apps in the last few years. But sometimes the convenience of getting food from your favourite restauran… [+1519 chars]
